alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 4:04PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Fort Morgan affecting Morgan County. South Platte River near Weldona affecting Weld and Morgan Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Platte River near Weldona. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 8.0 feet then to a crest of 8.7 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
